formatted_address: Arrival Hall, 10 Airport Blvd., Changi Airport Singapore, Terminal 4, Singapore 819665
name: UOB at Terminal 4 Arrival

reviews.text:
Good customer service.

As the fourth terminal in Changi Airport, T4 aims to serve a larger community of passengers, ensuring that our passengers can travel with ease of mind with greater travel options. T4 boasts environmentally friendly design elements with optimal use of natural lighting and energy management systems.

Teller name jayden liew kok jie is very rude and not helpful, I ask a small favour if he can give me a change for my bill, He answered, he don't have even he has a bunch of small bill in front of him. Again I tried to ask politely if its possible but he is very firm he don't have even its already on his hand.
This place is outstanding and feels really good here.

This place is very large, with automatic check-in procedures so everything is very fast. The airport has many gates, so wherever you go, you must pay attention to the signs or you will get lost.
After checking in, you will go to the waiting and shopping area, which is very nice and clean
In general, as a place to spend money, Singapore knows how to make people's pockets comfortable and satisfied
Free fast wifi connection but you have to go to the information counter to check in and apply for wifi.

vicinity: Arrival Hall, 10 Airport Boulevard, Changi Airport Singapore, Terminal 4
